name: CVE-2010-0532
description: Race condition in the installation package in Apple iTunes before 9.1 on Windows allows local users to gain privileges by replacing an unspecified file with a Trojan horse.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:9.0.2:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:9.0.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:9.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:*:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:9.0.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
